hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude has stopped" with title "Claude Code" sound name "default"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Claude is requesting permission" with title "Claude Code"'

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); current_dir=$(basename "$cwd"); time=$(date "+%H:%M"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=""; if git -C "$cwd" -c core.useReplaceRefs=false rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then git_branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useReplaceRefs=false branch --no-color 2>/dev/null | sed -e '/^[^*]/d' -e 's/* \(.*\)/\1/'); fi; venv=""; if [[ -n "$VIRTUAL_ENV" ]]; then venv="${VIRTUAL_ENV##*/}"; fi; used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); total_input=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); total_output=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); cost=$(echo "scale=4; ($total_input * 3 / 1000000) + ($total_output * 15 / 1000000)" | bc); printf "(%s) " "$time"; if [[ -n "$SSH_CONNECTION" ]]; then printf "\033[0;31m[%s]\033[0m " "$(hostname -s)"; fi; printf "\033[0;34m[%s]\033[0m " "$model"; printf "\033[0;35m[%s]\033[0m " "$current_dir"; if [[ -n "$git_branch" ]]; then printf "\033[0;33m[%s]\033[0m " "$git_branch"; fi; if [[ -n "$venv" ]]; then printf "\033[0;36m(%s)\033[0m " "$venv"; fi; if [[ -n "$used" ]]; then bar_length=10; filled=$(printf "%.0f" $(echo "scale=2; $used * $bar_length / 100" | bc)); empty=$((bar_length - filled)); bar=""; for ((i=0; i<filled; i++)); do bar+="▓"; done; for ((i=0; i<empty; i++)); do bar+="░"; done; printf "\033[0;32m[%s %s%%]\033[0m " "$bar" "$used"; fi; printf "\033[0;37m[$%s]\033[0m" "$cost"
